page.title: 03THE VILLAGE TODAY
page.content: As there are 985 people in Letham, there have to be adequate activities to cater for everyone.After a day's work both women and men may like to relax in the Hotel or the Pub situ_ ated in the Square where they may play darts or pool.The country around us affords many walks and rambles which anyone is free to enjoy. There is a bowling club, a Drama group and in the Village Hall,dances are held regularly.Parents can take their families to the park.From a survey conducted in school the most common family is one girl,one boy_least common has five children. They may live in a bungalow built in the garden of one of the original houses; every available site seems to have been built on in the last few years.
